p: Longan polysaccharide 1 from fruit pulp of D. longan significantly stimulated the production of cytokine interferon-γ, enhanced the activity of murine macrophages, and improved B-and T-lymphocyte production to inhibit tumor formation combined with immunomodulation effect ( 163, 164). Moreover, the polysaccharide–protein complex from fruit pulp showed strong immunomodulation activity ( 165).
